txt.en:
'I am very glad to have your assistance in this matter, [placeholder].

'While luring our prey into the open is one of my goals, the other is naturally to subdue the beast. The purpose of a lure such as this is to be devoured, so I would like to add a poison to our bait.

'Scholars are able to produce a volotile mixture that hunters favour -- pure fire oil. Bring me twenty containers of the flammable oil, and I'll add the materials to our collection.'
'Well done, [placeholder]! Your contribution is greatly appreciated.\n\n'Be sure to speak with me again if you have more ingredients to add to the pile.'
'Have you gathered the materials I requested, [placeholder]?'
Baiting the Beast: Hot Like Fire
Hasta is asking that anyone willing to help him should gather the various ingredients necessary to draw forth the menace from beneath the Water-works.
Collected pure fire oil for Hasta ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Bring the pure fire oils to Hasta
Pure fire oil can be mixed by Scholars throughout Middle-earth.\n\nHasta would like you to bring him twenty containers of fire oil.
Collect pure fire oil for Hasta ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
